while you knit a read banned books banner meditate on how you can use your unique voice interests and talents to create change in your community - hang read banned books banners in public places around your town with a tag including information for how to register to vote - gift a read banned books banner to your local library to display - gather your friends and organize a craftivism group knit read banned books banners together and plan ways you can help turn out more community members to vote in local elections some organizations you might want to support are -
